title: Is taking vitamin supplements immediately after Covid vaccination advisable?
description: Answer (1 of 4): It would not hurt to wait for 3 days for the immune system to activate. Some vitamins do have anti-inflammatory properties that may reduce the immune reaction. This applies to anti-inflammatory medications as well. This includes non-steroidel anti-inflammatories like Ibepruhen a...
